quotes.quote: A person's a person. No matter how small.
quotes.author: Dr. Suess

quotes.quote: Children are not a distraction from more important work. They are the most important work.
quotes.author: John Trainer

quotes.quote: Play is the highest form of research.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To take children seriously is to value them for who they are right now rather than adults-in-the-making.
quotes.author: Alfie Kohn

quotes.quote: They may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them FEEL.
quotes.author: Carol Buchner

quotes.quote: Tell me and I’ll forget; Show me and I may remember; involve me and I’ll understand.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Let the child be the scriptwriter, the director and the actor in his own play.
quotes.author: Magda Gerber

quotes.quote: Teachers have three loves: love of learning, love of learners, and the love of bringing the first two loves together.
quotes.author: Scott Hayden

quotes.quote: A great teacher takes a hand, opens a mind, and touches a heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Be sure that in your educating you are not manufacturing obedient citizens, but rather unleashing powerful, creative souls.
quotes.author: Vince Gowmon

quotes.quote: Our heritage and ideals, our code and standards the things we live by and teach our children are preserved or diminished by how freely we exchange ideas and feelings.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don't just teach your kids to read, teach them to question what they read. Teach them to question everything.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Only where children gather is there any real chance of fun.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Teaching kids to count is fine, but teaching them what counts is best.
quotes.author: Bob Talbert

quotes.quote: Teach children what to think and you limit them to your ideas. Teach children how to think and their ideas are unlimited.
quotes.author: Sandra Parks

quotes.quote: Teachers do the noble work of educating our children. And we can't thank them enough for the hard work they put in every day to ensure a bright future for all of us.
quotes.author: Denise Juneau
